Cooks delicious meat etc. We have this cosori since two months and absolutely love it. We have a Ninja dual zone as well but like this one the most for several reasons . It looks compact but still large enough to make a decent size meal. Portable enough that we took it to the cottage and made all our meals in it so we didn’t have to eat out, clean up is a breeze. We like the light and window so you can check to see how far the meat is done but especially like the sleek look of the fryer. It’s very easy to use , shipping was fast. Definitely recommend. description: Model: CAF-L501-KUS Color: Dark GrayDimensions (L x W x H): 10.8 x 10.9 x 12.1 in / 27.4 x 27.6 x 30.6 cm(without handle); 10.8 x 14.4 x 12.1 in (with handle); basket dimensions: 9.0 x 9.0 x 4.3 in Capacity: 5.0 qt / 4.7 L (serves 2-4 people) Power Supply (US/CA Only): AC 120V, 60Hz Rated Power: 1500W Temperature Range: 170°450°F / 77°230°C Time Range: 160 min Package Contents: 1 x Pro LE 5.0-Quart Air Fryer; 1 x Recipe Book; 1 x User Manual
